entry.title: the humble rejoice.: pills.
entry.summary:
via

Woot! One of the reasons I still work in pharmaceuticals.

thehumblerejoice:

.. raw:: html

So this past winter break, my sister and brother-in-law had introduced to me a dietary pill called Max Digest that is designed to help the body break down various foods. According to them, the pill would allow me to eat foods with a little gluten such as foods with soy sauce. I’ve tried it a few… .. raw:: html .. raw:: html
